name: Armored Battles
description:
Welcome to the most dangerous and funniest battlefields over the world! Armored Battles is an arcade game takes you to drive a turbo-engined tanks to destroy enemies! Select your tank fly away your opponents!

Main Features:

- Modern Tanks : In Armored Battles you will be able to drive and do battle in modern military vehicles around the world.

- Flying Tanks : Shotting the other tanks may fly away them! While they are on air you have an advantage to do combo on them!

-Bring the arcade fight on 21st century environment. Fight against your opponents on a desert,jungle or city,even on Mars where you can push them to a krater!

Note: Theres only one map and 4 tanks at this time. Desert,city,Ice and Mars maps planned ones.
